cyclone.name: IRMA
cyclone.current_location: about 20 mi ENE of St. Thomas
cyclone.trajectory: continuing WNW across the Turks & Caicos and Bahamas, then bending toward the south-east coast of Florida

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Florida Keys and south-east Florida coast, central and north Bahamas, northern Cuba
weather_observation.wind: High likelihood (58% in 5 days) of sustained 50-kt winds with a 37% chance of hurricane-force (64-kt) winds near the port.
weather_observation.storm_surge: Dangerous surge of several feet possible along the Broward County coast as the hurricane approaches and onshore flow increases.
weather_observation.rainfall: 4–8 inches of rainfall possible with locally higher amounts, producing flash-flood potential.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Large, life-threatening surf and rip currents impacting vessel traffic and berth operations.
